creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: string bound book with dark blue cover; woodblock images of humans, animals, and demons engaging in humorous, dramatic activities
markings: second to last page, top margin, in pencil: [Kyosai]; last page, ULC, in pencil: [1050]; seals last two pages
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: Kyōsai Drunken Pictures (Vol. 2)
